sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_6ca6db13db92320003417bedbf9619af
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Slack on New Incident (to Main)</name><order>10</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[// ATTENTION: This BR Sends to Main Channel only. 
(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

// Initialize a new SlackMessage
var slack = new SlackMessage();
// Set up the payload
slack.payload.text = "New: `" + current.short_description.getDisplayValue() + "`";
slack.payload.username = "New Incident Submitted";
slack.payload.icon_emoji = ":exclamation:";
slack.payload.channel = gs.getProperty('slack_message.default_channel');

// Define Message
var fullMessage = '';
if (current.assignment_group.getDisplayValue() != ""){
	fullMessage += 'Assignment Group: ' + current.assignment_group.name + '\n';
}
fullMessage += 'Priority: ' + current.priority.getDisplayValue() + '\nCaller: ' + current.caller_id.getDisplayValue();

// Define message colors based on priority
var priorityColor = '';
if (current.priority == '1'){               //Critical
	priorityColor = '#f00303'; //red
} else if (current.priority == '2'){        //High
	priorityColor = '#f09203'; //orange
} else if (current.priority == '3'){        //Moderate
	priorityColor = '#3c9f3e'; //green
} else {                                    //Low and Planning
	priorityColor = '#D3D3D3'; //gray
}	
	
// Set up Attachments (Full Message Details and Link)
slack.payload.attachments = [];
slack.payload.attachments.push({
    'title': current.number.toString(),
    'title_link': 'https://' + gs.getProperty('instance_name') + '.service-now.com/nav_to.do?uri=incident.do?sys_id=' + current.sys_id + '%26sysparm_stack=incident_list.do',
    'text': fullMessage,
	'color': priorityColor,
});
 
// Fire off the message
slack.send();
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-28 20:25:40</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6ca6db13db92320003417bedbf9619af</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Slack on New Incident (to Main)</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_6ca6db13db92320003417bedbf9619af</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-28 20:41:35</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=6ca6db13db92320003417bedbf9619af"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_56b4c717db52320003417bedbf961900
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition>current.assignment_group.u_slack_channel.getDisplayValue() != '';</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Slack on New Incident (to Group)</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[// ATTENTION: This BR Sends to Group's Channel only. 
(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	
// Initialize a new SlackMessage
var slack = new SlackMessage();
 
// Set up the payload
slack.payload.text = "Issue: `" + current.short_description.getDisplayValue() + "`";
slack.payload.username = "New Incident Assigned to this Group";
slack.payload.icon_emoji = ":exclamation:";
slack.payload.channel = current.assignment_group.u_slack_channel.toString();

	
// Define message colors based on priority
var priorityColor = '';
if (current.priority == '1'){               //Critical
	priorityColor = '#f00303'; //red
} else if (current.priority == '2'){        //High
	priorityColor = '#f09203'; //orange
} else if (current.priority == '3'){        //Moderate
	priorityColor = '#3c9f3e'; //green
} else {                                    //Low and Planning
	priorityColor = '#D3D3D3'; //gray
}

	
// Set up Attachments (Full Message Details and Link)
slack.payload.attachments = [];
slack.payload.attachments.push({
    'title': current.number.toString(),
    'title_link': 'https://' + gs.getProperty('instance_name') + '.service-now.com/nav_to.do?uri=incident.do?sys_id=' + current.sys_id + '%26sysparm_stack=incident_list.do',
    'text': 
    	'Priority: ' + current.priority.getDisplayValue() + '\n' +
		'Caller: ' + current.caller_id.getDisplayValue(),
	'color': priorityColor,
});
 
// Fire off the message
slack.send();

	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-28 19:16:30</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>56b4c717db52320003417bedbf961900</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Slack on New Incident (to Group)</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_56b4c717db52320003417bedbf961900</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-28 20:39:39</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=56b4c717db52320003417bedbf961900"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_e4b00713db52320003417bedbf961917
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.SlackMessage</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Slack's incoming webhook connection via REST</description><name>SlackMessage</name><script><![CDATA[var SlackMessage = Class.create();
 
SlackMessage.prototype = {
    'initialize': function() {
        if (gs.getProperty('slack_message.default_icon_url') != '') {
            this.payload.icon_url = gs.getProperty('slack_message.default_icon_url');
        }
        else if (gs.getProperty('slack_message.default_icon_emoji') != '') {
            this.payload.icon_emoji = gs.getProperty('slack_message.default_icon_emoji');
        }
    },
     
    'send': function (text, channel) {
        // Set the text and channel (or fall back to defaults)
        this.payload.text = text || this.payload.text;
        this.payload.channel = channel || this.payload.channel;
         
        // Encode the payload as JSON
        var SNJSON = JSON; // Workaround for JSLint warning about using JSON as a constructor
        var myjson = new SNJSON();
        var encoded_payload = myjson.encode(this.payload);
         
        // Create and send the REST Message
        var msg = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
		msg.setEndpoint(this.endpoint);
		msg.setHttpMethod(this.method);
		msg.setRequestBody(encoded_payload);
		var res = msg.execute();
		return res;
    },
     
    'endpoint': gs.getProperty('slack_message.default_endpoint'),
    'method': 'post',
    'payload': {
        'channel': gs.getProperty('slack_message.default_channel'),
        'username': gs.getProperty('slack_message.default_username'),
        'text': '',
        'attachments': []
    },
     
    'type': 'SlackMessage'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-28 18:46:23</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>e4b00713db52320003417bedbf961917</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SlackMessage</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_e4b00713db52320003417bedbf961917</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-28 18:46:23</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_b98c0f17db52320003417bedbf961959
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="incident">assignment_groupVALCHANGES^ORpriorityVALCHANGES^ORstateVALCHANGES^ORshort_descriptionVALCHANGES^ORdescriptionVALCHANGES^ORcommentsVALCHANGES^ORwork_notesVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="assignment_group" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="priority" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="short_description" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="description" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="comments" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="work_notes" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Slack on Incident Updates (to Main)</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[// ATTENTION: This BR Sends to the main channel defined in properties. 
(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

// Initialize a new SlackMessage
var slack = new SlackMessage();
	
	
// Define Variables for the Payload
var newStatus = current.state.getDisplayValue();
var oldStatus = previous.state.getDisplayValue();
	
	
// Add close codes if there is one. && is resolved or closed.	
if (current.state == 6 || current.state == 7) { 
	if (current.close_code.getDisplayValue() != ""){
		newStatus = newStatus + " -- " + current.close_code.getDisplayValue();
	} else if (current.close_code.getDisplayValue() == ""){
		newStatus = newStatus;
	}
} 
if (previous.state == 6 || previous.state == 7) {
	if (previous.close_code.getDisplayValue() != ""){
	   oldStatus = oldStatus + " -- " + previous.close_code.getDisplayValue();
	} else if (current.close_code.getDisplayValue() == ""){
		oldStatus = oldStatus;
	}
}
	
// Define other Variables for the Payload	
var newPriority = current.priority.getDisplayValue();
var oldPriority = previous.priority.getDisplayValue();
var newGroup = current.assignment_group.getDisplayValue();
var oldGroup = previous.assignment_group.getDisplayValue();
var newSHDescription = current.short_description;	
var newDescription = current.description.getDisplayValue();	
var newWN = current.work_notes.getJournalEntry(1);	
var newComm = current.comments.getJournalEntry(1);	
	
var fullMessage = "";

// Add Updates to Message:
if (current.state.changes()) {
	fullMessage += "\nStatus changed to " + newStatus;
} 
	
if (current.assignment_group.changes() && oldGroup != "") {
	fullMessage += "\nAssignment Group was " + oldGroup + ", now is " + newGroup;
} else if (current.assignment_group.changes() && oldGroup == ""){
	fullMessage += "\nAssignment Group updated to " + newGroup;
}
	
if (current.priority.changes()) {
	fullMessage += "\nPriority was " + oldPriority + ", now is " + newPriority;
}
if (current.short_description.changes()) {
	fullMessage += "\nShort Description updated to: " + newSHDescription;
}
if (current.description.changes()) {
	fullMessage += "\nDescription updated to: " + newDescription;
}
if (current.work_notes.changes()){
	fullMessage += "\nNew Work Note: " + newWN;
}
if (current.comments.changes()){
	fullMessage += "\nNew Comment: " + newComm;
}
	
	
// Always send Status, Priority and Assignment Group information even if they don't change:
if (!current.priority.changes() || !current.assignment_group.changes() || !current.state.changes()){
	if (!current.state.changes()) {
		fullMessage += "\nStatus remains " + newStatus;
	} 
	if (!current.assignment_group.changes()){
		fullMessage += "\nAssignment Group remains " + newGroup;
	} 
	if (!current.priority.changes()){
		fullMessage += "\nPriority remains " + newPriority;
	}
}

	fullMessage += "\nUpdates made by " + current.sys_updated_by.getDisplayValue();

	
// Define message colors based on priority
var priorityColor = '';
if (current.priority == '1'){               //Critical
	priorityColor = '#f00303'; //red
} else if (current.priority == '2'){        //High
	priorityColor = '#f09203'; //orange
} else if (current.priority == '3'){        //Moderate
	priorityColor = '#3c9f3e'; //green
} else {                                    //Low and Planning
	priorityColor = '#D3D3D3'; //gray
}
	
	
// Set up the payload
slack.payload.text = "Updates on: `"+current.short_description.getDisplayValue()+"`";
slack.payload.username = "Incident Updated";
slack.payload.icon_emoji = ":wrench:";
slack.payload.channel = gs.getProperty('slack_message.default_channel');
	
// Set up Attachments (Full Message Details and Link)	
slack.payload.attachments = [];
slack.payload.attachments.push({
    'title': current.number.toString(),
    'title_link': 'https://' + gs.getProperty('instance_name') + '.service-now.com/nav_to.do?uri=incident.do?sys_id=' + current.sys_id + '%26sysparm_stack=incident_list.do',
    'text': fullMessage,
    'color': priorityColor,
});
 
// Fire off
slack.send();

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-28 19:43:56</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b98c0f17db52320003417bedbf961959</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Slack on Incident Updates (to Main)</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_b98c0f17db52320003417bedbf961959</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-28 20:41:58</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=b98c0f17db52320003417bedbf961959"/></record_update>

remote_update_set.display_value: Slack Incident Notification Integration - by Thais Pulliam

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_51d78b17db52320003417bedbf961958
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition>current.assignment_group.u_slack_channel.getDisplayValue() != "" && current.assignment_group.changes()</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="incident">assignment_groupVALCHANGES^ORassignment_groupCHANGESFROM^EQ<item endquery="false" field="assignment_group" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="assignment_group" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="CHANGESFROM" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Slack on Incident Re-Assigned (to Group)</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[// ATTENTION: This BR sends only to group's channel. 

(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
// Initialize a new SlackMessage
var slack = new SlackMessage();
	
// Define Variables for the Payload
var newStatus = current.state.getDisplayValue();
var oldStatus = previous.state.getDisplayValue();
var newPriority = current.priority.getDisplayValue();
var oldGroup = previous.assignment_group.getDisplayValue();
var fullMessage = "";
	
// Add close codes if there is one. && is resolved or closed.	
if (current.state == 6 || current.state == 7) { 
	if (current.close_code.getDisplayValue() != ""){
		newStatus = newStatus + " -- " + current.close_code.getDisplayValue();
	} else if (current.close_code.getDisplayValue() == ""){
		newStatus = newStatus;
	}
} 
if (previous.state == 6 || previous.state == 7) {
	if (previous.close_code.getDisplayValue() != ""){
	   oldStatus = oldStatus + " -- " + previous.close_code.getDisplayValue();
	} else if (current.close_code.getDisplayValue() == ""){
		oldStatus = oldStatus;
	}
}

if (oldGroup != ""){
	fullMessage += "\nAssignment Group was " + oldGroup;
}
fullMessage += "\nIncident is now assigned to your group";
fullMessage += "\nStatus is " + newStatus;
fullMessage += "\nPriority is " + newPriority;
fullMessage += "\nUpdates made by " + current.sys_updated_by.getDisplayValue();

// Define message colors based on priority
var priorityColor = '';
if (current.priority == '1'){               //Critical
	priorityColor = '#f00303'; //red
} else if (current.priority == '2'){        //High
	priorityColor = '#f09203'; //orange
} else if (current.priority == '3'){        //Moderate
	priorityColor = '#3c9f3e'; //green
} else {                                    //Low and Planning
	priorityColor = '#D3D3D3'; //gray
}

	
// Set up the payload
slack.payload.text = "Issue: `"+current.short_description.getDisplayValue()+"`";
slack.payload.username = "Incident Re-Assigned to This Group";
slack.payload.icon_emoji = ":ticket:";
slack.payload.channel = current.assignment_group.u_slack_channel.toString();

// Set up Attachments (Full Message Details and Link)
slack.payload.attachments = [];	
slack.payload.attachments.push({
    'title': current.number.toString(),
     'title_link': 'https://' + gs.getProperty('instance_name') + '.service-now.com/nav_to.do?uri=incident.do?sys_id=' + current.sys_id + '%26sysparm_stack=incident_list.do',
    'text': fullMessage,
    'color': priorityColor,
});
 
// Fire off
slack.send();
	

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-28 19:26:48</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>51d78b17db52320003417bedbf961958</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Slack on Incident Re-Assigned (to Group)</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_51d78b17db52320003417bedbf961958</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-28 20:46:08</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=51d78b17db52320003417bedbf961958"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_a86a4bd7db52320003417bedbf96197f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition>!current.assignment_group.changes()</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="incident">active=true^short_descriptionVALCHANGES^ORdescriptionVALCHANGES^ORpriorityVALCHANGES^ORstateVALCHANGES^ORcommentsVALCHANGES^ORwork_notesVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="active" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="true"/><item endquery="false" field="short_description" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="description" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="priority" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="comments" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="work_notes" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Slack on Incident Updates (to Group)</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[// ATTENTION: This BR sends only to Group's Slack Channel
(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
if (current.assignment_group.u_slack_channel.getDisplayValue() != "" && !current.assignment_group.changes()){
	
// Initialize a new SlackMessage
var slack = new SlackMessage();
	
// Define Variables for the Payload
var newStatus = current.state.getDisplayValue();
var oldStatus = previous.state.getDisplayValue();
var newPriority = current.priority.getDisplayValue();
var oldPriority = previous.priority.getDisplayValue();
var newSHDescription = current.short_description;	
var newDescription = current.description.getDisplayValue();	
var newWN = current.work_notes.getJournalEntry(1);	
var newComm = current.comments.getJournalEntry(1);	
var fullMessage = "";
	
// Add close codes if there is one. && is resolved or closed.	
if (current.state == 6 || current.state == 7) { 
	if (current.close_code.getDisplayValue() != ""){
		newStatus = newStatus + " -- " + current.close_code.getDisplayValue();
	} else if (current.close_code.getDisplayValue() == ""){
		newStatus = newStatus;
	}
} 
if (previous.state == 6 || previous.state == 7) {
	if (previous.close_code.getDisplayValue() != ""){
	   oldStatus = oldStatus + " -- " + previous.close_code.getDisplayValue();
	} else if (current.close_code.getDisplayValue() == ""){
		oldStatus = oldStatus;
	}
}
	

//Add Updates to Message:
if (current.state.changes()) {
	fullMessage += "\nStatus changed to " + newStatus;
} 
if (current.priority.changes()) {
	fullMessage += "\nPriority was " + oldPriority + ", now is " + newPriority;
}
if (current.short_description.changes()) {
	fullMessage += "\nShort Description updated to: " + newSHDescription;
}
if (current.description.changes()) {
	fullMessage += "\nDescription updated to: " + newDescription;
}
if (current.work_notes.changes()){
	fullMessage += "\nNew Work Note: " + newWN;
}
if (current.comments.changes()){
	fullMessage += "\nNew Comment: " + newComm;
}

	
// Always send priority and state information even if it doesn't change:
if (!current.priority.changes() || !current.u_platform_ticket_resolver_group.changes() || !current.state.changes()){
	if (!current.state.changes()) {
		fullMessage += "\nStatus remains " + newStatus;
	} 
	if (!current.priority.changes()){
		fullMessage += "\nPriority remains " + newPriority;
	}
}
	
// Re-inform that Assignment Group hasn't changed.
fullMessage += "\nThis group is still assigned to this incident.\nUpdates made by " + current.sys_updated_by.getDisplayValue();

// Define message colors based on priority
var priorityColor = '';
if (current.priority == '1'){               //Critical
	priorityColor = '#f00303'; //red
} else if (current.priority == '2'){        //High
	priorityColor = '#f09203'; //orange
} else if (current.priority == '3'){        //Moderate
	priorityColor = '#3c9f3e'; //green
} else {                                    //Low and Planning
	priorityColor = '#D3D3D3'; //gray
}

	
// Set up the payload
slack.payload.text = "Issue: `"+current.short_description.getDisplayValue()+"`";
slack.payload.username = "Incident Updated:";
slack.payload.icon_emoji = ":wrench:";
slack.payload.channel = current.assignment_group.u_slack_channel.toString();

// Set up Attachments (Full Message Details and Link)
slack.payload.attachments = [];
slack.payload.attachments.push({
    'title': current.number.toString(),
     'title_link': 'https://' + gs.getProperty('instance_name') + '.service-now.com/nav_to.do?uri=incident.do?sys_id=' + current.sys_id + '%26sysparm_stack=incident_list.do',
    'text': fullMessage,
    'color': priorityColor,
});
 
// Fire off
slack.send();
	
}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-28 19:36:37</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a86a4bd7db52320003417bedbf96197f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Slack on Incident Updates (to Group)</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_a86a4bd7db52320003417bedbf96197f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-28 20:42:14</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=a86a4bd7db52320003417bedbf96197f"/></record_update>
